title: Introduction to C Programming
details: This comprehensive course will teach you the fundamentals of C programming, including syntax, data types, control structures, and best practices. You'll gain hands-on experience through coding exercises and projects.

title: Introduction to Algorithms
details: Dive into the fascinating world of algorithms and algorithm design techniques. This course will cover a wide range of algorithms, from sorting and searching to dynamic programming, with practical examples and real-world applications.

title: Introduction to C++ for DSA
details: Master C++ programming for competitive programming and data structures. Learn advanced C++ concepts, data structure implementations, and algorithmic problem-solving skills to excel in coding competitions and technical interviews.

title: Basic Data Structures
details: Explore the world of basic data structures such as arrays, linked lists, stacks, and queues. Understand their principles, implementation, and practical usage in solving real-world problems.

title: Introduction to OOP Python
details: Get started with object-oriented programming (OOP) in Python. Learn how to create classes, objects, and methods, and apply OOP concepts to build scalable and maintainable Python applications.

title: Software Engineering
details: Gain expertise in software development methodologies, software design, testing, and project management. Learn how to work effectively in software development teams and deliver high-quality software products.

title: AWS, Cloud Computing
details: Explore Amazon Web Services (AWS) and the principles of cloud computing. Build, deploy, and manage scalable and reliable cloud-based applications and services using AWS tools and services.

title: Database (MySQL)
details: Master the MySQL database management system for data storage and retrieval. Learn SQL, database design, and optimization techniques to manage and query data efficiently.

title: Problem-Solving Part
details: Enhance your problem-solving skills and critical thinking abilities with this course. Solve challenging problems that will sharpen your analytical mind and prepare you for technical interviews.
